2.Text: You started out skip tracing and finding deadbeat dads, but your considerable talent soon found you tracking a craftier, more desperate class of crooks. You often sign on to hunt criminals who have crossed international borders, or are hiding out in countries without extradition treaties. You always get your quarry, and though you’re not looking for a scrap you take pride in handling a takedown quickly and with minimal fuss. At first, your latest gig seemed like any other. Then your target displayed a depth of resources that didn’t fit the profile. The deeper you dug, the weirder the story got. Still hot on the trail, you have no idea what you are about to plunge into.

3.Text: You like to say things like: "Poster says dead or alive. Which will it be?" and are probably from the Modern Juncture though all junctures can be home to Bounty Hunters.
